title: Gradual Guidance Reduction Instructional Design for Open Chemistry Experiments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry lab skills and understanding of chemical reaction principles
context.additional_context: Conducts chemistry experiments in VR simulation environments, cultivating problem-solving skills by virtually replicating real lab equipment malfunctions.

learning_goals: Learners can propose solutions through scientific reasoning when unexpected experimental results occur
Learners can autonomously develop experimental plans according to a gradual guidance reduction strategy in VR-based laboratory environments
Learners can lead collaborative problem-solving processes based on responsibility allocation within experimental groups
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
